issues.title: Missing Annual Election Requirement
issues.description: California Education Code requires that the board president be elected annually at the organizational meeting. The policy states the board "shall elect a president" but does not specify the required annual election timing or organizational meeting requirement.

legal_citations.text: At its organizational meeting, the governing board shall elect from its membership a president, a clerk, and such other officers as it deems necessary.

issues.required_language: The Board shall elect a president annually at its organizational meeting held in December following each regular election.

issues.title: Missing Clerk Election and Duties
issues.description: Education Code requires election of a clerk, and the policy references clerk duties when president/vice president are absent but does not establish the clerk position or election process. This is a mandatory officer position.

legal_citations.text: At its organizational meeting, the governing board shall elect from its membership a president, a clerk, and such other officers as it deems necessary.

issues.required_language: The Board shall also elect a clerk annually at its organizational meeting. The clerk shall perform the president's duties when both the president and vice president are absent or disabled.

issues.title: Missing Term Length Specification
issues.description: While the policy implies annual election through reference to organizational meetings, it should explicitly state the one-year term length for the president position as required by Education Code.

legal_citations.text: The term of office of each officer shall be one year or until a successor is elected.

issues.required_language: The president shall serve a term of one year or until a successor is elected.

issues.title: Missing Reference to Organizational Meeting Requirements
issues.description: The policy should reference that the organizational meeting must be held in December following regular elections, as this provides important context for the election timing.

legal_citations.text: The organizational meeting shall be held during the month of December following the regular election.

issues.required_language: The organizational meeting shall be held during the month of December following the regular election.
